grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 禍根【カコン】root of evil, source of evil
災禍【サイカ】disaster, accident, calamity, catastrophe
kun reading compounds: 災い【わざわい】calamity, catastrophe, misfortune
災い転じて福となす【わざわいてんじてふくとなす】to turn misfortune into fortune (esp. through one's own efforts), to turn the potential disaster to one's advantage
